casebody.data:
ROBERT H. MEADE v. THE UNITED STATES [No. 45181] [98 C. Cls. 797;

319 U. S. —]

Pay and allowances; equalization act of 1922; inclusion of naval academy service; act of March 4,1913.

Decided February 1, 1943; petition dismissed. Opinion 98 C. Cls. 797.

Plaintiff’s petition for writ of certiorari denied by the Supreme Court June 7, 1943.
